reviews.review: Csgo tarzı oyun sevenler için zaman kaybı.
This is a really good improvement from the first Portal game. The attention to the details, the characters, the environment, the symbolism, the story; everything in this game is so well made.
单人模式很益智，只要不是特别傻都可以不看攻略稍微想一想就能通关，而且2011年这个画质已经非常牛逼了，现在打折卖的话你只会觉得-------值，联机我还没玩，因为我没朋友。（有的话也去打竞技游戏了，毕竟国内的游戏文化是靠着竞技游戏起来的，宁可去生那口气，也不愿意花钱买个单机，想找个小伙伴真是太难了）

it good. it bullys my head

마지막 엔딩 너무 좋고 노래는 말할 것도 없는 띵곡. 시대를 초월한 갓겜. 근데 3D멀미있으면 어지러울 수도 있음. 난  오래는 못하겠더라.
Если жизнь одаривает вас лимонами - не делайте лимонад. Заставьте жизнь забрать их обратно!

One of the best singleplayer experience of the last decade with simple but fun gameplay. The Co-op is almost equally as good if not even better sometimes and with an essentially endless suply of community made maps you can spend hours upon hours on this game.
Советую для игры вдвоем, а соло сюжет как и первая часть норм

入坑steam的作品，相当推荐解谜爱好者入手，不推荐晕3D的人尝试这个游戏。
起源引擎的画面即使放在现在也不算low，谜题相当多且复杂，最重要的是通关单人模式后即可以跟朋友二人来尝试官方的双人关卡，也可以在创意工坊中游玩其他玩家说制作的个人关卡，甚至还有衍生出的其他游戏mod也可以尝试游玩，大部分mod都是免费的，有个别mod有在steam上上架，游戏机制甚至完全变化了，不再是用传送门枪而是游戏里面其他元素所做的道具，不过大部分mod都要有原游戏才行，所以想要体验这些优秀mod最好还是要入手这个游戏。（由于是刚入坑steam的游戏，因为已经很久没有玩了，评测无法更细致的讲述内容了）
这游戏V社打折次数不算频繁，但是每年肯定都会打折，推荐打折的时候入手。
Очень интересная логическая игра которая затягивает

As This Is One Of My Favorite Game, I Am A Little Biased. But When I Say This Game Is Amazing, I Am Not Lying. With A Great Story, And Gameplay That Makes You Rethink Everything You Know About Gameplay, I Reccomend This Game With A Passion. Characters Are One Thing, But This Game Let's You Make Friends. And This Is Just A Miniscule Amount Of The Greatness This Game Has

Portal 2 is the sequel to the original gameplay experience game, Portal. It's a simple game, there are puzzles, and all you have is your portal gun and your surroundings to figure how you get from start to finish. The game is widely considered classic and a "must-play." You can test out the portal gun's capabilities, you can invest with the lore of the story and secrets behind the laboratory you are trapped in, and there is much more. You don't even have to play the first game to understand Portal 2. The first game is basically the prologue to the second game. If you aren't into puzzles then this may not be the game for you, but you might change your mind once you invest yourself after 10 levels.

Beyninize biraz olsun güveniyorsanız sizi Valve'ın baş yapıtıyla baş başa bırakmak istiyorum. Portal açmak gerçekten bu kadar eğlenceli olmamıştı. Amacınız portalları kullanarak bölümleri geçmek Gerek solo , gerek co-op fazlasıyla eğlenceli bir oyun. Yanlış bilmiyorsam üç buçuk tl gibi kelepir bir fiyattan satılıyor indirimlerde. Kesinlikle alarak beyninizi kullanmanın verdiği hazzı tatmanızı isterim.
Giereczka logiczna z ciekawą fabuła, nadal czekam aż wyjdzie portal3 ;x

its a GREAT GAME for anyone who likes campian or Boss Battles

Santo dios este juego es una obre maestra eso seria todo lo que puedo decir ya que al jugarlo sientes que estas viviendo una pelicula de ciencia ficcion y los personajes aun que sean muy pocos son muy buenos mas el doblaje castellano que le da esa toque de un juego genial y no solo eso ya que tambien tiene una de las mejores historias de videojuegos que e jugado ya que en el 1 juego era hacer pruebas y mas pruebas mientras descubrias lo que paso en las instalaciones de aperture science (cabe aclarar que hacer pruebas era muy divertido ya que te ponian a pensar que era lo que me gustaba pero aveces era muy repetitivo) y ahora en el segundo juego cambian eso de una forma majestuosa metiendo mas personajes y aclarando mas la historia y dando un muy buen final.

Sinceramente yo conocia este juego desde hace mucho pero nunca me pude pasar el 2 (el primero si por que lo tenia en mi xbox 360) y ahora que me lo paso me doy cuenta que este juego vale la pena.

Juego perfecto para jugar en cuarentena.
Эта игра тоже зашебись как и просто portal только она ещё лучше.
Criativo e desafiante, tanto na história Solo quanto no modo co-op. Extremamente recomendado
